contents:
@海上生明月:石研究员的大作，你也可以好好拜读一下：

首要罪证在此：

https://jvi.asm.org/content/82/4/1819.short

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2441860/

The pathogenesis of SARS coronavirus (CoV) remains poorly understood. In the current study, two recombinant baculovirus were generated to express the spike (S) protein of SARS-like coronavirus (SL-CoV) isolated from bats (vAcBS) and the envelope (E) and membrane (M) proteins of SARS-CoV, respectively.

次要罪证在此：https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S1567134810000766

其他SCI可以略读：

https://jvi.asm.org/content/86/8/4620.short

https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0168170207001050

https://www.nature.com/articles/nature12711

https://www.microbiologyresearch.org/content/journal/jgv/10.1099/vir.0.034108-0

https://www.nature.com/articles/nm.3985

https://virologyj.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12985-015-0422-1

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2851503/

https://www.microbiologyresearch.org/content/journal/jgv/10.1099/vir.0.82220-0

https://www.microbiologyresearch.org/content/journal/jgv/10.1099/vir.0.82220-0

管中窥豹，看看她这几年究竟干了些什么。
